description: The memorial wall is dedicated to all those killed in conflicts in Ireland between 1916 and 1923.
title: Glasnevin cemetery: Sledgehammers used to damage memorial wall
title_page: Glasnevin cemetery: Sledgehammers used to damage memorial wall - BBC News
maintext: The memorial, officially known as the Necrology Wall, is an ongoing project which will eventually record the names of every man, woman and child who died over a turbulent period in Irish history, from the start of the 1916 Easter Rising through to the end of the Irish Civil War in 1923.
